Type.Name: CanvasEventArgs

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CanvasEventArgs extends GLib.SignalArgs

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Details of events coming from CanvasItems. See .
Docs.remarks:
Contains mouse button clicks, motion, enter/leave, and key press events from CanvasItems. Use these to create user interactive items. The x and y coordinates of the event structure have been converted to canvas world coordinates.
To signify that an event has been handled, and stop it from being further emitted, set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Create a new instance with this constructor if you need to invoke a delegate.

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'Gdk.Event'
